reviewtext: This TLZ Mini bag is well built and has a large front pocket.  However, there are no pouches inside the front pocket to permit better arrangement of batteries and memory cards.  Because of this design oversight, I returned this bag and purchased theLowepro Rezo TLZ 10 Digital Camera Case Gadget Baginstead.  The TLZ 10 has a smaller front pocket but inside the pocket there are two pouches.  Note, however, that the TLZ 10 will not accomodate as long a lens as will the TLZ Mini.
summary: Good bag but needs pouches inside the front pocket
